name: City of Heroes Freedom
description: City of Heroes Freedom™, the world's most popular super-powered hero MMO that you can now play for free, redefines City of Heroes® on the cornerstones of content, rewards, and choice. Get more than 20 issues of unparalleled immersive content for action-hungry MMORPG gamers, as well as ongoing regular content updates (issues), new monthly signature story arcs, and new Incarnate endgame adventures. Select from monthly rewards from the Paragon Rewards program, and be assured that your loyalty as a player, present or past, is honored. Play the way you want to: choose to play for free or become a VIP player and access exclusive content. Join City of Heroes Freedom today and play for free, forever!
